entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
